results.title: You’re Vaccinated for Covid-19, and You Just Tested Positive. Now What?
results.abstract: Although the risk of vaccinated people becoming infected with the coronavirus is low, it can still happen, the C.D.C. says. Here’s what you need to know.
org_facet: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

multimedia.caption: A vaccination site in El Paso, Texas, in May. Although the risk of vaccinated people becoming infected with the coronavirus is low, it can still happen, according to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and doctors.
